Documentation

Online documentation for my R packages.

Packages:

hansard

An ironically named R package to automatically fetch data from the UK Parliament API. Available on CRAN and GitHub.

mnis

An R package for downloading data from the Members’ Names Information Service API. Available on CRAN and GitHub.

parlitools

A collection of tools, datasets and maps for analysing UK politics. Available on CRAN and GitHub.
